about_the_game:
In this 1920s cartoon turn-based comedy RPG, take to the stage as Otto the shy comedian in their epic quest to...make it to work on time??? Are you ready to entertain your foes? Form a comedy Troupe? Meet eccentric toons and talking furniture? Then prepare to joke and laugh your way through a rowdy roommate, buff bees, town bullies, and more!

Game Features

  • Journey Through a 1920s cartoon world!
  • Go on stage and outperform your foes!
  • Giggle through a pun-filled narrative!
  • Dance to an original old-school soundtrack!

We hope you enjoy our first Steam Demo!

short_description: Monochrome RPG is a 1920s cartoon adventure following a shy non-binary toon as they must take to the stage performing theater moves, entertaining enemies, and building an acting troupe of diverse toons in order to overcome the perils that face them on their journey.
